LanguageData.Miho_Elegans_Hediff.label: Elegant Organ Potential
LanguageData.Miho_Elegans_Hediff.description: The mist flower organ, or the elegant organ, is an organ that exists only in a Miho's body. It activates water-soluble mecanites and spreads them throughout the body. One of the reasons why it is called the elegant organ is because of the tubes that spread throughout the body are shaped like the stem of an elegant flower. \n\n In order to maintain the Elegant Organ, you must periodically supply mecanites through helianto products.
LanguageData.Miho_Elegans_Hediff.stages.0.label: Disabled
LanguageData.Miho_Elegans_Hediff.stages.1.label: very degraded
LanguageData.Miho_Elegans_Hediff.stages.2.label: degraded
LanguageData.Miho_Elegans_Hediff.stages.3.label: normal
LanguageData.Miho_Elegans_Hediff.stages.4.label: overcharge
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Pipe_High.label: Smoked Solar Pipe
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Pipe_High.descriptio: Solar Pipes clear your mind. They also have a stimulating effect on the metabolism.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea_High.label: Drank Solar Tea
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_Tea_High.description: Solar Tea replenishes yang. It is good to drink before going to bed as it increases sleep efficiency.
LanguageData.Miho_PositiveFlower_High.label: Eating sunflower petals
LanguageData.Miho_Restraint_Hediff.label: Sealed
LanguageData.Miho_Restraint_Hediff.description: Some force has sealed your powers.
LanguageData.Miho_Restraint_Hediff.stages.0.label: Sealed (rejection)
LanguageData.Miho_Restraint_Hediff.stages.1.label: Sealed (partial)
LanguageData.Miho_Restraint_Hediff.stages.2.label: Sealed (adaptation)
